tsutaeyou
Dawn comes softer than a sleeping breath
Your dream runs through the forest now
You wake up and stir to find the light
If you have lost it, I will find it for you
It is hidden in our future
Now if we joined hands
we would go far away without letting go
In the memory of a far off day
the story of the blue country bloomed
Shining eyes
Your singing voice
Let us share it
Wolf and Playful Days
This is nice.
You are awake?
This is too nice.
I think I will get by without freezing like this.
You can talk.
I am cold, after all.
I need to be heated.
Jeez.
Burnt rice!
That looks like burnt rice you see floating in stews!
You said Renose has lots of different kinds of strong liquor, right?
Yeah,
we will probably be fine even if we get held up by a blizzard.
I hope one comes.
Hey hey.
Just so you know...
Renose is famous for its lumber and furs.
Right.
Do not get upset if you see wolves pelts among those furs.
I get eaten by wolves,
but mice get eaten by me.
In our world, it is normal to hunt and be hunted.
I will not complain.
And even though you say that, humans are even more shocking.
You buy and sell each other, right?
You mean the slave trade?
It is profitable and a necessary business.
In the same way you calmly talk about trading people,
we have no feelings for those who are hunted.
Though, when I was being hunted by another man, you got pretty worked up, did not you?
Yes I got worked up.
Really worked up.
Do not speak in monotone!
It is only natural.
Why?
Because it is embarrassing.
It really is.
Right?
They are fellow merchants.
It looks like it will take a while to enter the town.
Is this like a temple courtyard?
Those are in front of churches.
It is odd that they are setting up right in front of the town walls.
It does not look like they are doing any business either.
The gates are not closed,
so it does not appear to be a revolt.
You are expecting another battle here, are not you?
I do not particularly want one.
What is with that face?
It is true that ever since you met me you have been caught up in a number of disputes.
But there has not been a single time where I directly caused one!
The first one...
Well, that may have been partially my fault.
But it was more because you were greedy.
The next one happened entirely because you got greedy and failed.
And the last one was because you got all worked up on your own.
Am I wrong?
Well, I do see where you are coming from,
but I have trouble accepting it.
Though it is true you were not the because of all the trouble.
It is natural for you to find it hard to accept.
Why is that?
You always measure me against your own standards,
so you feel you are being manipulated by me.
That is not true.
So stubborn.
Why you!
You are finally being honest with yourself?
Not good, not good.
How boring.
Stew would be nice.
Oh, dinner?
It is pretty cold.
It depends on the price,
but it would be nice to have something with a flour and butter base rather than one with cream.
That does sound good.
There are times when the scent of milk beats wine.
The vegetables at this time of year are still especially good.
Vegetables?
Do not you know the taste of black, tender chunks of beef floating in a milky white broth?
Well, they do say that good things are poison to the eyes and tongue.
That is not very fair for me, considering I was not able to have a meal for several hundred years.
Well, I will consult my purse first.
This is an identification plaque that shows you are a traveling merchant.
The townsfolk will not do business with outsiders unless they display this,
so make sure you do not lose it.
Oh what,
it is just a cheap wolf pelt.
It is not like I think it is the best thing in the whole world.
But that is a matter of the differences between species, not the quality of my tail!
That is true.
Between something that is at the lower end of a superior scale,
and something that is at the upper end of an inferior scale,
you would definitely commend the second one!
That is true.
No,
between a steward from a noble house with no fame, fortune or personality, and an ordinary citizen with all three,
no matter which way you look at it, you would commend the latter.
Room or luggage?
I need a room for two.
Would you prefer a warm room or a bright one?
Is there a choice besides the warm room?
Okay, I will take the horse to the stables.
If you talk to the maste...
the old man, he will get a room for you.
Okay.
Behave yourself now.
Third floor, by the window.
Okay, third floor...
By the window.
I think it is a splendid tail.
It is a good, warm fur.
Well then, I will go dry your clothes.
When that is done, we will get onto the stew!
Traveling merchant identity plaque, huh?
Strange things they have got here.
Oh crap!
S-Sorry.
What is wrong?
Are not you eating?
I am going to go maintain the furs.
I need to make sure they fetch a good price.
You are already too expensive.
So much that you will not find any buyers.
Has anyone bought you at this point?
Oh come on.
Good morning.
Right.
So, what are you going to do?
Gathering stories about you comes first.
Stories about me, and about Yoitsu.
Let us find a chronicler first like I did in Kumerson.
I will leave that to you.
You know the right channels.
Something wrong?
No.
I know how to go about it.
So what do you know?
The man who knows the way does the work.
The man who knows why that man works becomes his employer.
I see.
Now I know why you work so gallantly.
They used to say that a long time ago.
So if I am your employer, I have to reward you somehow.
Reward?
Yes.
In other words,
is not there something you want?
Nothing in particular.
As long as you are in a good mood, I am happy.
Are you treating me like a spoiled child?
At least children listen when you scold them.
Well, first let us go talk to the old man.
He does not look it, but he is the owner.
You are coming, right?
Yep.
Even if you smack away my hand.
If I clap my hands now, will the magic spell disappear?
Why, what have I been doing?
Ah yes,
this is the town of lumber and fur, Renose!
I must stock up on furs and be off to the next town!
Are you a traveling, traveling merchant?
I can judge the quality of furs.
Why, you do have good eyes.
But what about judging the quality of people?
I do not know.
I am under an evil spell.
Then we must not clap out hands, so as to keep it intact.
But they have already been clapped once.
Are you saying it is already disappearing?
Yes.
So could you recast it before the magic fades?
Like this?
Come now.
We are going.
You...
It was not surprising enough to make you so clumsy, was
Your spell was too strong,
you fool.
So when are you going to start running amok?
I wonder.
Maybe when you stop doing things like this?
You have developed quite a sharp wit.
Have not I?
You really have become a smooth talker.
Did you get someone to teach you?
No.
It just came to me at the moment.
At the moment?
That makes me even happier.
When I stop doing things, you said?
Something the matter?
I see.
You wanted me to care that much.
You really are adorable.
A chronicler?
Yes.
Or just someone who knows the legends of the town.
There was a man called Rigolo who was a chronicler,
but unfortunately, he is currently in a fifty-man meeting.
He will not meet with anyone.
Fifty-man meeting?
Did you see the town entrance?
I saw it.
Merchant-like people were gathered there.
Does that have something to do with this fifty-man meeting?
Are you saying there is some kind of problem in town?
The furs, I guess.
Furs?
Rigolo is the scribe for the meeting.
For legends, old lady Bolter the tanner knows quite a bit.
Any others?
Others?
Ah,
the old geezer at the Latton company.
No.
In the heat of the summer year before last...
My God.
I see.
The legends of the town will only be found in books.
Then,
we will have to have Rigolo show us the records.
That is how it goes.
The years weather even stone towers.
And even the memories of men...
It is frightening.
Hey.
Want something to eat?
You should build more vocabulary.
Excuse me.
She was surprised when she saw me.
Do not tell me, another animal?
I did not get that feeling,
but maybe that girl was taken aback by my beauty.
Not likely.
Wait.
Girl?
Yes.
That was a woman?
What kind of mutt are you, looking around at other women when I am right beside you?
You should not say things like that.
It is much cuter if you show it with your behavior.
You are a fool, so you would not know if I did not say it.
So?
What should we do?
Will it be difficult to meet this whatsisname man?
He said his name was Rigolo.
If he is in a meeting, then talking to him will be difficult.
Well, it does depend on his role at the meeting.
That face says you want to know the subject of this meeting.
No, not at all.
In that case, you will be wandering around until the meeting is over with absolutely no interest in what is happening?
I cannot fool the eyes of the sage wolf Horo, after all.
I want to know what is happening in town so badly, I cannot help myself.
And maybe
if possible, make a profit.
It is enough to require these wooden plaques.
Something interesting is happening.
But you know...
Do not go too far.
I know.
I wonder about that.
First, how about the sights of this town,
dear princess?
That will do.
It is an honor.
So?
What shall we do?
I do not remember whether I really came here or not.
It is changed a lot since then, I am sure.
Let us go to the port.
The port?
It seems that ships have become quite common recently.
It is quite a sight.
Ships, you say?
Yes.

missed each other just before love

to the perfect world

there flows the comet river

we cannot avoid hurting each other
If you will embrace me
I feel like we will touch
If you can embrace me
